title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: October 19, 2023, 03:40:30 PMLast edit: July 16, 2024, 09:57:17 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Ok, I have several other threads with sale items - wanted to consolidate everything into one. I will update this thread as items are sold.Bitcoin Items:Balletcrypto Gold Plated REAL Series BTC walletYou can see it on the ballet site here: https://store.ballet.com/products/ballet-wallet?variant=43291273199779Price: $75 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Balletcrypto REAL Series Economic Preppers Conference edition wallet Originally sold here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422145.0Price: $35 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Satochip “BTC WGMI” wallet released at the Bitcoin Amsterdam 2022 ConferencePrice: $25 quantity available: 6----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Xerola DIY 5 coin set (originally was a 6 coin set but these 2 sets are missing the polished silver finish coin) Will come with 2 holograms and a Xerola coin bag per coin.any visible scratches are on the capsules not the coins - these are old coins so the capsules could use replacing.Price: $50 per set quantity available: 0 sets----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Delos DIY coinsPrice: $10 per coin quantity available: 09----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------LNbits programmable NFC card. This boltcard includes an NTAG 424 DNA NFC tag that allows for full replay protection with the LNbits Boltcard extension. Card will include an RFID blocking sleeve.Price: $7 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Coinkite SatsCard - Blank front side, print or draw your own design. Back side is standard SatsCard design. Can be found on the Coinkite store page here: https://store.coinkite.com/storePrice: $5 quantity available: 1----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Coinkite SatsCard - Full Reserve Banking design. Can be found on the Coinkite store page here: https://store.coinkite.com/storePrice: $9 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Coinkite TapSigner - Genesis Hex Dump design. Can be found on the Coinkite store page here: https://store.coinkite.com/storePrice: $25 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Coinkite TapSigner - Blank front side, print or draw your own design. Back side is standard TapSigner design. Can be found on the Coinkite store page here: https://store.coinkite.com/storePrice: $20 quantity available: 1----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------RarityCheck VIBGYOR Gold Gilded Silver 1oz coin #89/100Coin is assembled - was not a DIY - but was never funded. It was given to me by Rarity Check when he was giving coins to victims of the coldkey ScamKey rug pull. I had also won a set of the coins in the charity auction to benefit same said victims. Thus this one is a duplicate and I am selling to offset a small fraction of my Scamkey losses. Coins originally sold for $299 excluding load value.Original sales thread (which also contains the public address for this coin) https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415734.0Price: $150 available quantity: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Bitcoin Orange Pills - TicTac styled candies with a Bitcoin label Price: $5 ea quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Supreme BTC DIY 3 coin set – only 100 sets made I have sets 64, 71, 72, 73 and 86Price: .008 BTC quantity available: 5----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Supreme BTC DIY 6 poker chip set - This combines 2 actual series - the first series was 1 chip (red and with 8 bands) and series 2 was the 5 other chips.Price: .003 BTC quantity available: 2----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------SVRN Energy drinks - before you throw away the can, peel the label and redeem your 500 sats via the QR code under the label!More information here: https://svrnenergy.com/?v=f24485ae434a Price: $5 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Lightning Koffee 100% Columbian coffee Price: $15 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------CryptoCash board game. This is a Bitcoin board game, where you have to navigate thru all the shitcoinery - winner is who has the most Bitcoin in the end.Game can be seen here: https://www.walmart.com/ip/Crypto-Cash-Game-Fast-Paced-Bitcoin-Betting-Game-for-Teens-and-Adults-Aged-14-and-Up/906544645 Price: $10 quantity available: 2----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Custom "The CryptoBill" MMLLC notes – both DIY and assembled availablePrice: $10 ea quantity available DIY: 43 quantity available assembled: 43----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The Little Hodler Money Printer - still in the original plastic bag - stock image usedPrice: $39 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Balletcrypto 2023 Holiday Gift Card set of 1 landscape and 1 portrait Price: $13 per set quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Bitpiggy - originally sold on https://bitpiggys.com/ (site is now down) for $40 - they originally came with optional OpenDimes and a qr code with the OpenDimes address to stick on the piggy. These are just the Piggy's and I only have the pink ones remaining. I took the remainder of his stock which was, at that time, 28 piggys and now 5 remain. Price: $15 ea quantity available: 3----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Non-Bitcoin Items:Balletcrypto REAL Series LTC wallet with engraving on the back – “Celebrating  Litecoin’s Third Halving August 2023” The engraving was done by Ballet. Original Sales Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460933.0Price: $20 quantity available: 5----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Fresh Litecoin - coin #Fresh-276 loaded with .5 LTCPrice: $60 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Litecoin "HODL My Beer" bottle openerPrice: $10 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Coinkite Litecoin Opendimes - brand new, never used, in original packaging - comes as a 3 packCoinkite no longer does anything other than Bitcoin, so the only other seller is The Litecoin Foundation, can find them for sale here: https://shop.litecoin.net/products/litecoin-opendimePrice: $35 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Loaded Litecoin Opendimes - I have been given multiple Opendimes by a collector and asked to sell them here.These were loaded by pooler (litecoinpool.org) directly with block rewards as follows:4 with 25 Litecoins ea --- 2 have miner fees and 2 do not due to the Litecoin blocks had no transactions.Txns that loaded the 4 with 25 Litecoins:2 with the miner fees:https://chain.so/address/LTC/Lc1gugqoMZQQ8sFGdZaEwyvvUasbhmz6RLhttps://chain.so/address/LTC/LcynBFV9MQUyPpkqPQG6KetqvfAetFF8UL2 with no miner fees:https://chain.so/address/LTC/Lgrf1t6MD5JouUW6X9LRKMzJqZYGGwVThxhttps://chain.so/address/LTC/LYM7FhWRiKMt4kVcZAFyZMxjfQQnXL77vM25 with 1 Litecoin each - all were direct loaded from a single block reward - so the 25th Opendime has 1.00086035 LTC.all will be verified as sealed and intact/secure prior to shipping.These were loaded in 2019, prior to Litecoins halving.here is the txn that loaded the 25 Opendimes that are loaded with 1 LTC ea:https://chain.so/tx/LTC/875eb9c431c599960771a167c2a8acffdb980006ace9613a0fb0d60858faabc8each Opendime will also include a 3d printed case.Price: the four with 25 LTC: 30 LTC ea and the 25 with 1 LTC: 2 LTC ea  quantity available: 4 @ 25LTC load and 25 @ 1LTC loadPymt address: LUA1jtK65rGifTnP9JEmRHH4o99DNvDNXM----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Unobtainium 1 oz fine silver bar DIY wallet #13Price: $100 quantity available: 1----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Stellar Lumens 3 coin set: Copper Aluminum and BrassPrice: $50 for the set quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------XMR Postcards by Kryptowerks matching numbers #35/64 set Price: $25 for the set quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------FlyeLyfe "HODL Your Horses" XMR poster and XMR Conference poster - originally bought from minerjones - threads are in archival and blank though so no sense to link them. XMR poster is numbered 122 Price: $75 for the set quantity available: 1----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Lynx Black Monero wallet #27/100 Lynx has them in stock still for $39. This will come with original hologramsPrice: $30 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Lynx Black Aion wallet #23/100 Lynx has them in stock still for $39 ea. This will come with original hologramsPrice: $30 quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Lynx Ethereum DIY wallets Brass and steel set #84/100 The .1 ETH is sold out on their site. Lynx sells their wallets for $39 ea These will come with original hologramsPrice: $60 for the set quantity available: 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Balletcrypto Polygon Gift Cards Price: $8 quantity available: 15----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Balletcrypto Litecoin Gift Cards Price: $8 quantity available: 23----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Balletcrypto ETH/NFT walletsPrice: $8 quantity available: 10----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Tangem VOYR multicurrency self storage NFC enabled walletPrice: $5 quantity available: 17----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Tangem 2 card pack multicurrency self storage NFC enabled walletPrice: $30 quantity available: 1 set----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Croatian Crypto Stamps – I did not redeem these for their NFT’s only scanned them to see which ones they were. a.   V1:  tier 4 (train) b.   V3:  tier 4 (grey) and tier 5 (blue) c.   V4:   tier 4 (tesla coil) d.   V5:  tier 4 (balthazars submarine) Price: $5 ea - quantity available: V3 - 0, V4 - 0, V5 - 0----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------All orders will come with a random free gift – will be one of the following items: Cardsmiths S1 random common card or a BTCTC S2 random common card. (until I run out of extra cards)Payment:PAYMENTS ACCEPTED:USD via Strike: strike.me/moparminingllcBitcoin: bc1q30g8fj0kgrh06sacksdukw6cpw3c5rq492g66aLightning via address: moparminingllc@strike.meLightning invoice: send me a dm and I will reply with a LNURLTHE EXCEPTION IS THE LOADED LITECOIN OPENDIMES - SEE THAT LISTING FOR PYMT ADDRESSSHIPPING:Shipping can be done directly by me or item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones.

comments.body: As items sell, I will adjust quantities and do a strikethru on any item where the quantity becomes zero, I will also remove sold out item images to reduce the length of the OP
